Title: Provides veterans free use of cabins and cottages located in public places of recreation within the state
Summary: Provides veterans free use of cabins and cottages located in public places of recreation within the state.
LawSection: Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation Law
LawCode: Amd ยง13.19, Pks & Rec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the parks, recreation and historic preservation law, in relation to providing veterans free use of cabins and cottages located in public places of recreation within the state
